text: Klares goldgelb mit reichlich Schaum. Malzig, fruchtig, etwas Banane, leicht säuerlich, sehr spritzig.
Mild hefiger, eher wässriger Antrunk. Leichte Herbe im Mittelteil, die deutlich zunimmt. Trocken herber Nachhall, dunkel, minimal fruchtig. 8/7/7/7/8/7

Many thanks for this beer to kevnic2008. Pianka spora i trwala, klarowne, wiadomo zapach gozdzikow bananow i moreli. W smaku jablkowo bananowe lekko przyprawowe, solidne w smaku i wyraziste jak na filtrowanego pszeniczniaka. Dobra robota, polecam tym co nie lubia osadu w tym stylu
Clear golden, lush frothy head. Aroma of spicy yeast, wheat. Medium body. Well balanced taste with much spiciness, light bitterness, bread.-- rated with beerbasher/winphone
Bottle 50 cl. Clear golden color with very good white head. Aroma: very spicy, clove, chewing gum, wheat bread and malt. Taste: fizzy carbonation, spiced (clove), banana and fruits.
*Old rating, best before 01.04.  Fruchtig-süßliches und typisches Kristallweizen. Fruchtige Aromen, weiche Weizennote. Mild-süßlicher und ganz leicht herber Nachgeschmack.

0,5 l bottle. A dark golden in the glass, clear of course and a big white foamy head. Clove, yeast and chewing gum on the nose. Starts more fuity like apple with yeast, followed by a flat cardboard sequence and wheat. Again hints of fruits with banana in the aftertaste. A lot of taste for a Kristall. But still only a Kristall.

Bottled, 500ml at the Wurzburger Ratskeller, Wurtzburg, Bavaria. Gold, heavily carbonated with fizzed white head. Quite a sweet beer from the start, sweet fruits, hints of tropical fruits along with the normal weizen banana esters. The carbonation gives a slight fusty grainy note. Fairly standard.
500ml Flasche. Ins Glas ergießt sich ein klares goldgelbes Bier, viel CO2, viel Schaum. Geruch hefig, leicht malzig fruchtig. Geschmack hefig, fruchtig, im Abgang leicht würzig.

Kristalweizen op de terugweg in Duitsland aan de Main.
Donker geel gouden met witte kraag, aroma van witbier en de rest werd verprutst door het citroenschijfje. 
Smaken van citrus, typische witbiermouten, kalk, matig zoet
Lichte body, matig zoet 

Jammer van het citroentje verder goed!
Its golden with a creamy, white head. The aroma has mild notes of fruit, banana, yeast and wheat. The sweet flavor has mild fruity notes, also mild yeast and wheat, and the finish is slightly spicy.
Clear pale golden colour, large white head. Fruity, hints of banana and mango, citrus fruit.

Bottle 50cl.Clear light to medium yellow color with a average to large, frothy, good lacing, fully lasting, white to off-white head. Aroma is light to moderate wheat, paper, light to moderate yeasty, banana, clove notes. Flavor is moderate sweet with a average duration. Body is medium, texture is creamy, carbonation is soft. [20090626]
Bottle, 5.4%. Mild clove aroma. Clear dark golden colour. Big stable white head. The flavour is slightly spicy, there is some clove. The mouthfeel is OK. Grainy finish.
Bottle. Clear golden, white foam. Light grainy nose. Banana more ponounced than in usual Kristall, grainy, light spice. Medium body, ok chewy. Banana and clove retronasal. Pleasant enough.

Bottle: Golden, smaller and quite stable loose white head, visible carbonation; lemons, but also shy traces of nutmeg and wheat in the nose; moderate sweetish-sourish flavour, relatively light bodied, slick; mainly lemons and some wheat in the sourish-fruity finish. A well crafted example of this odd style and a good thirst-quencher..........

Bottled at Cinema, Aschaffenburg, Bavaria.  Clear golden, small head. Restrained banana aroma. Sweetish with rounded spritzy mouthfeel, rather void of flavour - guess the filtering didnt do it any good. Salty finish.
UPDATED: JUL 22, 2009 Bottle.  Light banana and clove aroma.  Clear yellow tan color with nice big head.  Light tart malt, banana, and clove flavor.   A very good example of the style.
